definition: the quality of being free from errors or interruptions
details:
noun
- the quality of being free from errors or interruptions
= example: the quality of being free from errors or interruptions
- the quality of having a level and even surface
= example: the quality of having a level and even surface
- the quality of being bland and gracious or ingratiating in manner
= synonyms: blandness
- a texture without roughness
- powerful and effective language
= synonyms: fluency
